page.title: 14INDUSTRY
page.content: Many business activities are carried out in the area especially in Morland where two garages provide fuel and repair services with a similar garage in Cliburn. Six private heavy goods lorry owners provide a nationwide transport service with the largest being Tuer's Motors. Many of these trucks carry British Gypsum products from Kirby Thore. A modern industry, Survival Aids, has been set up in Morland Old School supplying many products for outdoor activities such as climbing. hiking and camping.The company, which employs many local people,runs a Survival Course where members 'live' off the land and are taught survival techniques. Morland Pianos specializes in the supply and maintenance of pianos.
